Element.name: Parameter
Element.Description: Parameters provide information about what activities are required to be triggered and/or what they produce. They are considered as Artefacts because they do not have any direct effect on the Sequence Flow or Message Flow of the Process. The state of the data object should also be set.

PropertyCategory.name: General
PropertyCategory.Property: The Class from which the parameter is exposed.
The maximum number of instances that the parameter must have. Valid values are one and many.
